name: Odairi
skill: Deals 1780/2180 DMG to a wide area of enemies.
ability: Moderately increases Crit DMG of Festival Doll team members.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the dolls put on display during the Doll Festival. The Emperor, one of the two dolls on the top tier of the Doll Festival stand. His love for Ohina is true, but he is too shy to express it. He says his actions should speak louder than words. Ohina's possessiveness was starting to bother him, but as he realized the importance of letting his true feelings be known, their relationship got better.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Clear Chapter 4
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Exchange for 1000 Hishi Mochi 
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 2501-6000. 
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5001-7500.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Hishi Mochi during "The Spirits' Doll Festival" event.

main: "I'd do anything for someone important to me."
summon: "I still have a lot of fight in me!"
limit_break: "We're even stronger now, thanks to you."
